lead_paragraph: Brad Marchand scored on a penalty shot midway through overtime to lift the Boston Bruins to a 2-1 win over the Buffalo Sabres on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Marchand Scores on Penalty Shot in OT, Bruins Top Sabres 2-1
headline.main: Marchand Scores on Penalty Shot in OT, Bruins Top Sabres 2-1

snippet: Brad Marchand scored on a penalty shot midway through overtime to lift the Boston Bruins to a 2-1 win over the Buffalo Sabres on Saturday night....
